casename: Public Prosecutor v Loganatha Venkatesan and Others
counsel: Anandan s/o Bala, Christina Koh Sok Kheng and Peter Koy Su Hua [Attorney-General's Chambers] for the prosecution; Luke Lee Yoon Tet [Luke Lee & Co] (assigned) and Nadarajan Kanagavijayan [K Krishan & Partners] (assigned) for the first accused; N K Rajarh [Rajah Velu & Co] (assigned) and Nicholas Cheong Fook Hing [Lim Soo Peng & Co] (assigned) for the second accused; Selva Kumara Naidu [Naidu Mohan & Theseira] (assigned) and Thrumurgan s/o Ramapiram [Palakrishanan & Partners] (assigned) for the third accused

headings.text: Peer Mohamed And John Tan Tai Poh
Wednesday 21 April 1999 - The Day of Death
The Defence Of Venkatesan And Chandran
